faqs.q: How long does a basic site take?
faqs.a: Usually 1–2 weeks once content is ready.

faqs.q: Can you integrate a booking system?
faqs.a: Absolutely—Calendly, embedded forms, or custom flows.

faqs.q: What do you need from me?
faqs.a: Logo/brand, pages/sections, example sites, and your content.
